Method Detail

getOrCreateVirtualDatacenter

public VirtualDatacenter getOrCreateVirtualDatacenter(User user,
                                                      Enterprise enterprise,
                                                      Datacenter datacenter,
                                                      VirtualMachineTemplate template,
                                                      AbiquoTemplateOptions options)
Gets a virtual datacenter where the given template can be deployed.

If no compatible virtual datacenter is found, one will be created, if possible.

Parameters:
user - The current user.
enterprise - The enterprise of the current user.
datacenter - The datacenter of the template.
template - The template to deploy.
options - The template options
Returns:
The virtual datacenter to be used to deploy the template or null if none was found and a compatible one could not be created.

findCompatibleVirtualDatacenters

public Iterable<VirtualDatacenter> findCompatibleVirtualDatacenters(Datacenter datacenter,
                                                                    VirtualMachineTemplate template)
Find the virtual datacenters compatible with the given template.

Parameters:
datacenter - The datacenter of the template.
template - The template to deploy.
Returns:
The virtual datacenters compatible with the given template.

configureNetwork

public void configureNetwork(VirtualMachine vm,
                             @Nullable
                             Network<?> gatewayNetwork,
                             @Nullable
                             List<Ip<?,? extends Network<?>>> ips,
                             @Nullable
                             List<UnmanagedNetwork> unmanagedIps)
Configure networking resources for the given virtual machine.

Parameters:
vm - The virtual machine to configure.
gatewayNetwork - The network to be used as a gateway.
ips - The ips to attach to the virtual machine.
